
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2025-12-26 02:29:26.901440                #
######################################


#growth #leader_trait_army_veteran #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_army_veteran_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_army_veteran
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_army_veteran = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_army_veteran }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_army_veteran show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_army_veteran_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_army_veteran
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_buccaneer_3 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_buccaneer = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_buccaneer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_politician #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_politician_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_politician
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_politician = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_politician }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_politician show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_politician_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_politician
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_politician
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}

		}

		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_principled }

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

#growth #leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {

		hidden_effect = {

		}
	}

#growth #leader_trait_shipwright #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_shipwright_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_shipwright } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_shipwright
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_shipwright = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_shipwright }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_shipwright show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_shipwright_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_shipwright }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_shipwright
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_shipwright
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_spycraft_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_spycraft_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_spycraft_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_spycraft_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_spycraft = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_spycraft }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_spycraft_2 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_spycraft_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_spycraft_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_spycraft_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_spycraft_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}

		}
	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_trailblazer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_trailblazer = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_trailblazer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_trailblazer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_trailblazer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}

		}
	}

#growth #leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_cultural_focus_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_cultural_focus_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_cultural_focus_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_cultural_focus_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_cultural_focus = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_economy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_cultural_focus }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_cultural_focus_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_cultural_focus_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_cultural_focus_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_cultural_focus_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_cultural_focus_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_frontier_spirit = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_economy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_frontier_spirit }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_frontier_spirit_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}

oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_reformer_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_reformer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_reformer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_reformer = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_economy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_reformer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_reformer_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_reformer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_reformer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_reformer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_educator #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_educator_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_educator
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_educator = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_educator }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_educator show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_educator_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_educator
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_educator
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#growth #leader_trait_master_bureaucrat #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_growth_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_supreme_organizer } }
	}
	allow = {

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_economy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_supreme_organizer }

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

	potential = {

	}
	allow = { always = yes }

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}

		}
	}
